title: Enough of these damn QQ syndra threads
body:
JFC she gets played at worlds and its like boards broke into a wildfire. Calm down. She isnt op. Just because she has high burst doesnt make her roll face. {{item:3001}} {{item:3156}} {{item:3157}} . Or you guys are actually that bad and cant manage to build mr.................................... 
I am just going to downvote every single post about how "syndra op" because she isnt, you just suck. Sorry a silver noob had to tell you that but you are welcome

replies.body:
lol yeah just let me finish one of those items before she gets double dorans and level 6.

https://puu.sh/rtGsz/036452778d.webm
Is that a varus mid? In worlds. Is this a joke? Of COURSE SYNDRA WILL DELETE A VARUS . I cant even take this comment seriously.
When silver criticizes a worlds pick ._.
Varus is immobile and isn't on the defensive side. Most burst mages who catch him out will destroy him.

The Varus was a poor pick specifically into Syndra. Varus has been played into other champs and been fine, but picking a champ into a hard counter (and he did pick Varus after Syndra) is asking for trouble.

I mean, he ate a W, a Q, an E, an R and an AA. Most mages would do some similar shit under the same situation. If that was an Annie, a Veigar or a Lux the exact same thing would have happened. As it turns out when you land 4 abilities onto someone they tend to take a lot of damage.
Not to mention he kept on fighting her regardless.

> [{quoted}](name=Akali is SO HOT,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=LboEFzUU,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-10-08T23:59:12.601+0000)
>
> lol yeah just let me finish one of those items before she gets double dorans and level 6.
> 
> https://puu.sh/rtGsz/036452778d.webm

Yis

> [{quoted}](name=Akali is SO HOT,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=LboEFzUU,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-10-08T23:59:12.601+0000)
>
> lol yeah just let me finish one of those items before she gets double dorans and level 6.
> 
> https://puu.sh/rtGsz/036452778d.webm

Lol, {{champion:134}} mains can't deny this so they downvote. Cancer hero 1shotting with just 800g on items.

Let's see, all her competition nerfed. Check.

Dominant in solo-Q AND premade. Check.

Was actually fine after her Q ratio buff but for some dam reason got extra unnecessary buffs. Check.

Will riot probably nerf something instead of simply reverting the buffs after Q ratio increase. Probably :/

Does syndra deserve nerfs. She does deserve them seeing as there's no one to really put up with her sadly. And unlike jinx buffing her counters isn't really the answer since they're pretty balanced atm.

Even if you build MR/hourglass, it's not going to do anything for her shove->roam plus she actually has good poke w/o having to use ulti until she has to make sure, which will probably be when 3 balls coulda killed her but she has 6-7 prepared or after you hourglass simply due to harass.

{{champion:55}} , the queen of soloq and roaming. Can actually skill match the syndra.  Shall we nerf kat too?? I am unsure  why people think burst mages need nerfs . If they nerf her 100-0 power they have to give her some sort of mobility to compensate .-. Common sense, really
>kat LUL

Kat doesn't offer any form of utility that syndra does, kat doesn't perform as strongly in premades too, kat doesn't shove a wave was safely, while she may have burst damage, her sustain damage isn't as great for objective taking, kat has prevalent counters, not to mention syndra can still provide heavy zoning with just her stun threat and Q spam+rylia.

Again syndra is just the victim of competition nerfed like jinx but she has to be nerfed cause the competition aren't doing badly just not meta OP anymore.

Kat thrives in premades as well, but that was just an example. Shes going to be nerfed because they saw her dominate a game at worlds. She has counters but because they saw a syndra main utilize syndra, shes "op omg pls nerf rito"

> [{quoted}](name=EcchiOtakuTM,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=LboEFzUU,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-10-09T00:06:20.622+0000)
> 
> Was actually fine after her Q ratio buff but for some dam reason got extra unnecessary buffs. Check.
> 
> Will riot probably nerf something instead of simply reverting the buffs after Q ratio increase. Probably :/

The Q ratio was buffed at the same time as Syndra was reworked, but your post seems to imply that it was a standalone buff. The Q ratio buff happened because Q lost its old Transcendent passive +15% damage to champions.

Yea it was a standalone buff cause syndra players including myself were in an uproar about the ratio being .7 which needed too much ap to outdo the old rank 5 Q, so they finnally increased the ratio by .05. Unless I'm misremembering, I'm sure it happened after the rework not during.

> [{quoted}](name=EcchiOtakuTM,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=LboEFzUU,comment-id=000300010000,timestamp=2016-10-09T20:39:35.506+0000)
>
> Yea it was a standalone buff cause syndra players including myself were in an uproar about the ratio being .7 which needed too much ap to outdo the old rank 5 Q, so they finnally increased the ratio by .05. Unless I'm misremembering, I'm sure it happened after the rework not during.

Are you a PBE player? I'm not, but they might have buffed Syndra's Q after they reworked her on the PBE? I'm sure that they did not buff her Q on the live servers at a different time than the rework. None of the patch notes after 6.9 have any Q buffs, and 6.9 does not include Syndra in the Mid Patch update. The Q buff is written with the rest of her rework.
http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-69-notes#patch-syndra
OH yea I was playing pbe for the mage update cause there was a lot of changes, maybe Im misremembering cause of that.

I think Syndra has been a little OP (her ult is overloaded) for a long time. I get that she represents true late game burst but it's too strong. I don't care for worlds for opinions unless a champ gets a high amount of kills/penta

I _love_ this game.

- I started playing at the end of 2012.
- For the whole 2013 I was called a noob for picking "that troll champ".
- In 2014 nobody played her, until somebody(was it Bjerg?) decided to pick her once in LCS against LeBlanc. It lasted for a month or two maybe.
- Entire 2015 again nobody seen, nobody heard. She was top 3 of worst winrate champions for like half of the season too.
- 2016 - People play shit like Varus or Vlad mid in LCS. Somebody picks Syndra, because nobody plays anything that could actually threaten her on the mid lane.

_"OHMIGUDSOOPPLSNERFNAO!!11!1111"_
LITERALLY THIS. I CANT EVEN. I FEEL THIS ON LIKE A SPIRITUAL LEVEL. And yes bjerg is probably who you saw because he kinda one tricks her.

I didn't actually see it at the time. Learned about it by mistake like a month later.

Needless to say, I was playing Syndra into LeBlanc for the same reason for at least half a year before that fact.
To be fair she currently has the highest playrate of all mid laners.

Ikr all of these idiot posts about her being OP just make me mad, and all of them are made by people that don't know anything about how she is played, and don't even know how much damage she really does with her ultimate and it ends up as saying that she "just presses R" and has 0 counterplay.

it does have 0 counterplay are you serious? idc about end game syndra, but level 6-8 is far too strong and too safe.
id go as far to say as her level 6 powerspike is the biggest in the game next to annies.
Yeah? She has the biggest power spike in mid lane, statistically? You can cry more c:

you bring literally nothing to this discussion.
Just a bad troll being a bad troll.
You are just a bad player crying about a high skill cap champion. Get.Good.

she is surely not high skill cap and i simply said she spikes too hard in power :)

wanna syndra 1v1? :)

Riot confirmed her being high skillcap tho? So you sound dumb ^.^
Also 1v1s are pointless, im actually too busy to deal with you

yup troll af.
have a good day at school child.

Mad bc bad, clearly.
Bye now {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
offer still on the table to 1v1 me handsome.
and what does that prove? LOL
You are asking if we are that bad. But she is being played at worlds. So obviously not being able to easily counter her has nothing to do with being bad.

She has counters. You not knowing them, doesnt mean she is broken. Thanks. The varus that got deleted at worlds to which you replied "Yis" to, if he killed syndra instantly before she could, would he be op? Op because of worlds or his kit? You also realize that bjerg basically one tricks syndra. So of course he is going  to be good  with her. Duh?

> [{quoted}](name=jojo9800,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=LboEFzUU,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-10-09T00:16:33.644+0000)
>
> She has counters. You not knowing them, doesnt mean she is broken. Thanks. The varus that got deleted at worlds to which you replied "Yis" to, if he killed syndra instantly before she could, would he be op? Op because of worlds or his kit? You also realize that bjerg basically one tricks syndra. So of course he is going  to be good  with her. Duh?

FINALLY someone gets it.

> [{quoted}](name=jojo9800,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=LboEFzUU,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-10-09T00:16:33.644+0000)
>
> She has counters. You not knowing them, doesnt mean she is broken. Thanks. The varus that got deleted at worlds to which you replied "Yis" to, if he killed syndra instantly before she could, would he be op? Op because of worlds or his kit? You also realize that bjerg basically one tricks syndra. So of course he is going  to be good  with her. Duh?

lol dude. I'm not saying I don't know her counters. I'm saying if she was easily countered she wouldn't be in worlds.

I'm sure it would help if "pros" didn't prioritize their dream teamcomp over what the enemy team is actually doing.

http://i2.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/000/782/935/ce2.png

>But she is being played at worlds. 

They also play Vlad who's basically a troll pick outside of the LCS.

A champion being picked in LCS means jack as they tend to ignore counters and strong picks as long as their teamcomp checks out with what they've been scrim'ing with.
This, any sane person in standard play picking Vlad against Syndra should be reported for int feeding. That crap only works in Worlds.
Judging from LCS-related comments, it doesn't work in LCS either.

> [{quoted}](name=Vistha Kai,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=LboEFzUU,comment-id=0000000100000000,timestamp=2016-10-09T17:54:40.287+0000)
>
> Judging from LCS-related comments, it doesn't work in LCS either.

I know, and find it hilarious. Like seriously, what do people expect if she gets matched in a farm lane? For her to stay there all game like a pleb?

Apparently for her to lose, because somebody picked Varus mid into a burst mage in LCS.

It'd be nice if people actually used brain once in a while, while watching those games.
But they don't, because _those are pros playing, so they can't be wrong_.

The truth is watching LCS doesn't teach you shit about the game or balance.

> [{quoted}](name=Vistha Kai,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=LboEFzUU,comment-id=000000010000000000000000,timestamp=2016-10-09T18:08:47.958+0000)
>
> Apparently for her to lose, because somebody picked Varus mid into a burst mage in LCS.

Lmao, I saw the video, the 1 second too late Cleanse followed by him walking back for an ult to the face.

> It'd be nice if people actually used brain once in a while, while watching those games.
> But they don't, because _those are pros playing, so they can't be wrong_.
> 
> The truth is watching LCS doesn't teach you shit about the game or balance.

People just don't understand Proplay simply isn't the same as standard play, majority of the things done in the LCS, the fact that {{champion:8}} is considered strong should really get that message through tbh.

Vlad is very strong right now. Still.

Most people just over-estimate him early and feed. Or they don't know how to play him during mid-late game. Or pick him into a comp without any form of engage.

I know he's strong, I just mean that the current meta simply doesn't favour him too well with games usually ending 25-30 minutes in. Unless you're a very experienced Vlad player, then this simply isn't enough time to farm your way into that hypercarry status.

I'll put it tha way:

I learned more about the game after 1 hour of WingsOfDeath's stream, than after watching LCS for 2 years.

LCS is like an inside joke. A meme, if you will.

Let me guess:

You think Lee Song is OP, you think every Yasuo/Riven player is toxic no matter what, Zed needs more nerfs, 1-shotting people from an unretaliable range is fun (Lux), Supports are persecuted, and Riot should keep buffing mages because they aren't good enough?

The boards are so easy.

> [{quoted}](name=Bladerunner7777,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=LboEFzUU,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-10-09T00:01:58.763+0000)
>
> Riot should keep buffing mages because they aren't good enough?

Okay seriously, no one thinks this, where are you people even getting this trash from?
